inkball

类 GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameConfig

  • public class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameConfig class handles the configuration settings for the game. It loads level data and score modifiers from a specified configuration file.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameConfig(java.lang.String filepath)
      Constructor for the GameConfig class.

      Gets the score decrease modifiers from wrong captures.

      Gets the score decrease modifier for wrong captures in a specific level.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameConfig

        public GameConfig(java.lang.String filepath)
        Constructor for the GameConfig class. Initializes the file path and the score modifiers.
        参数:
        filepath - The path to the configuration file.

    • 方法详细资料

      • readConfig

        public processing.data.JSONObject readConfig(App app)
        Reads the configuration from the specified file. Loads level data and score modifiers into the class variables.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance used for loading the JSON.
        返回:
        The complete JSON configuration object.

      • getLevelLayout

        public java.lang.String getLevelLayout(int levelNumber)
        Gets the layout file name for a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        The layout file name as a string.

      • getBallsConfig

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBallsConfig(int levelNumber)
        Gets the configuration for balls in a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        A list of ball configurations as strings.

      • getSpawnInterval

        public int getSpawnInterval(int levelNumber)
        Gets the spawn interval for balls in a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        The spawn interval in milliseconds.

      • getTime

        public int getTime(int levelNumber)
        Gets the time limit for a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        The time limit in seconds, or -1 if not defined.

      • getScoreIncreaseModifier

        public float getScoreIncreaseModifier(int levelNumber)
        Gets the score increase modifier for capturing holes in a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        The score increase modifier as a float.

      • getScoreDecreaseModifier

        public float getScoreDecreaseModifier(int levelNumber)
        Gets the score decrease modifier for wrong captures in a specific level.
        参数:
        levelNumber - The index of the level.
        返回:
        The score decrease modifier as a float.

      • getScoreIncreaseFromCapture

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getScoreIncreaseFromCapture()
        Gets the score increase modifiers from hole captures.
        返回:
        A map containing score increase modifiers.

      • getScoreDecreaseFromWrongCapture

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getScoreDecreaseFromWrongCapture()
        Gets the score decrease modifiers from wrong captures.
        返回:
        A map containing score decrease modifiers.
